## compL() function

Similar to [comp()](./compose.comp.md)<!-- -->, but composes given functions in left-to-right order.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function compL<A>(a: FnAny<A>): FnAny<A>;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  a | <code>FnAny&lt;A&gt;</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`FnAny<A>`
